## getOrderPaymentUrl() function

> This API is provided as a preview for developers and may change based on feedback that we receive. Do not use this API in a production environment.
> 

Get payment address to redirect user after placing order.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function getOrderPaymentUrl({ orderId, finishUrl, }: {
    orderId: string;
    finishUrl?: string;
}): Promise<{
    paymentUrl: string;
}>;
```

|  --- | --- | --- |
|  { orderId, finishUrl, } | <code>{</code><br/><code>    orderId: string;</code><br/><code>    finishUrl?: string;</code><br/><code>}</code> |  |

<b>Returns:</b>

`Promise<{
    paymentUrl: string;
}>`
